title: Weekly Roundup: Friday, December 11
description: This week: GOP leaders face facts as the Trump candidacy continues, the latest on the Democratic side of the race, and Michelle Obama's rap about college. This episode: Sam Sanders, campaign reporter; Tamara Keith, White House correspondent; Asma Khalid, campaign reporter; Domenico Montanaro, political editor. Find the team on Twitter @samsanders, @tamarakeithNPR, @asmamk, and @DomenicoNPR, and at npr.org/politics.
